aka: JFK: Assassination Update - The New Documents

cast.name: 凯文·科斯特纳 Kevin Costner
李·哈维·奥斯瓦尔德 Lee Harvey Oswald

director.name: 查尔斯·吉斯亚克 Charles Kiselyak

trans_title: 《刺杀肯尼迪》：刺杀更新－新档案
JFK: Assassination Update - The New Documents
introduction: Since the film JFK (1991) was made, many new documents have been released and examined. Jim DiEugenio brings these documents to our attention, and talks about the various "conspiracies" involved in John F. Kennedy's assassination. He aids in clearing up several of the complicated details that the film brought to light. Written by Rhyl Donnelly
chinese_title: 《刺杀肯尼迪》：刺杀更新－新档案
